Gina: "Ah! A visitor~" She coos, leaning over the bar as she fixes her hair. The stranger looks up from his drink to see Gina's beautiful face, which is framed in makeup and a mole on one cheek. "What can I get you?" Her eyes sparkle with mischief, "Or do you want something else?"
